Translations.Text: Ism
Atnan issekniyen n Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ahat tqelqev iman ik, imi ur ppilin d lmumnin
Ma ihwa ya£, ad asen d Nessers assekni seg igenni, ad iinzent, zdat es, tmegoav nnsen, s wannuz
Ur ten id ippas usmekti amaynut, s$uo Uenin, mebla ma u$alen as d inekkaoen
Ni$ skaddben. Ihi, ad asen d asen isallen, $ef wayen i$ef pmmaaliken
Day ur walan ara tamurt? Aceal i Nessenker degs n yal tayuga tukyist
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Mi Issawel Mass ik, i Musa: "oue s agdud imednas
agdud n Feraun. Day ur ppezziben ara
Inna: "a Mass iw! Nek ugade$ ad iyi skiddben
ad sekkwoen idmaren iw, ur ipserrie yiles iw. Ihi, Azen ar Haoun
U denbe$ $uosen. Ugade$ ad iyi n$en
Inna: "Xaii, oueet s issekniyen nne£. Aql a£ yidwen, Nessemeas en. Oo
Oueet ar Feraun, tinem as: "nekwni d amazan n Mass imavalen
Seddu, yidne$, At Isoail
Inna: "day ur k noebba ara $uone$, d llufan? U tesaaddav $uone$, iseggwasen di laameo ik
u txedmev igi txedmev. Kecc, seg ijehliyen
Inna: "xedme$ t asmi lli$ seg im$eooqen
Rewle$ segwen, mi kwen ugade$. Ifka yi Mass iw, uuwab. Irra yi seg imazanen
D l$it agi, i$ef a yi teppezzmev, i k ibbwin a pperrev, At Isoail, d aklan
Inna Feraun: "d acu T Mass imavalen
Inna: "d Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, ma tetebbtem
Inna i wi s d izzin: "la tsellem
Inna: "Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Inna: "s tidep, amazan nnwen id ippuceggaen $uowen, d aoehbani
Inna: "Mass n ugmuv, utaram, akked wayen illan garasen, lemmer tefhimem
Inna: "ma tedmev Oebbi, ur nelli d nek, a k nerr ar leebs
Inna: "i lemmer ad ak d awi$ ayen ipbegginen
Inna: "awi t id, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Iveggeo taakwazt is, tu$al d azrem n uuee
Issuffe$ ed afus is, d$a d amellal i imfeooen
Inna i imvebboen i s d izzin: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear amusnaw
ib$a a kwen issuffe$, s sseur is, seg wakal nnwen. D acu t lameo nnwen
Nnan: "sgani t, neppa akked gma s; azen ineccaden ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseeear amusnaw
Mlalen iseeearen, di lweqt akked wass ipwassnen
Nnan i imdanen: "ma ad tenjemaam
Ahat a neddu d iseeearen, ma d nitni ara irebeen
Mi d usan iseeearen, nnan as i Feraun: "ma ad a$ tili teqdiat, ma nerbee
Inna: "ih, d$a, kunwi, war ccekk, a ppu$alem seg iqoiben
Inna yasen Musa: "veggoet ayen ara tveggoem
Veggoen imraren akked taakwzin nnsen. Nnan: "s tezmert n Feraun, ard nekwni ara irebeen
Iveggeo Musa taakwazt is. Apan tesseblaa ayen id snulfan
Iseeearen $lin, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haoun
Inna: "tumnem yiS, uqbel ma serree$ awen? Neppa, war ccekk, d ameqwoan nnwen i wen isseefven sseur. A ppeeoem, ad awen gezme$ afus sya, avao sya; a kwen uuemoe$ akw $ef umidag
Nnan: "ulac u$ilif, acku ar Mass nne$, ara nezzi
Ih, nessaram ad Isemmee, Mass nne$, tuccva nne$ imi aql a$ d lmumnin imenza
Nweeea i Musa: "ooue s ugdud iW, deg iv, acku a kwen in vefoen
Iuzen Feraun ineccaden ar temdinin
wigi, s tidep, d arbaa amejiue
u nitni, s tidep, sserfan a
Nekwni, Neqquoa akken ma nella
Ihi, Nessuffe$ iten id si tebeirin akked tliwa
igerrujen, ixxamen ukyisen
Akka, nweooet yissen, At Isoail
Vefoen ten mi d inqeo yiiij
Mi mwalan irebbuyaa, nnan imeddukwal n Musa: "aql a$ a nepwaleeq
Inna: "xaii! Mass iw, s tidep, yidi. Ad iyi Inhu
Nweeea i Musa: "wwet ill s taakwazt ik"! Imfaoaq, yal loiha am udrar ameqwoaean
Nessqeob ed wiyav ar dinna
Nsellek Musa, akked wid akw iddan yides
Sinna ne$oeq wiyav
Deg wayagi, s tidep, d assekni. Tegwti degsen ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Eeku yasen d tamacahup n Iboahim
Mi inna i baba s akked ugdud is: "d acu taabdem
Nnan: "naabed tiaancuoin, mazal a tent njjem
Inna: "day awen d sellent, ma tnujem
Ne$ nefaant kwen, ne$ vuooent kwen
Nnan: "xaii, nufa d imezwura nne$, akka ay xeddmen
Inna: "day twalam ayen la taabdem
kunwi akked lejdud nnwen imenza
Nitni d icenga w. Siwa kan Mass imavalen
iyi Ixelqen; Neppa iyi Inhan
Neppa iyi Icceccan, iyi Isswan
Neppa iyi Isseeluyen ma uvne
ara iyi In$en, sinna, ara iyi d Ssidren
u, oe$be$, d Win ara Isemmeen tuccva w, ass iqeiiiyen
A Mass iw, £it iyi d, s uuwab. Ssemlil iyi d iaaoviyen
Err awal iw, d win n tidep, i ineggura
Err iyi si lweooat n Loennet n ssuaada
Semmee i baba. Neppa, s tidep, illa seg im$eooqen
Ur iyi Xezzu, ass n tnekra nnsen
ass ideg ur infaa wayla, ne$ derya
siwa win iqublen Oebbi, s wul unuie
A d teppae Loennet, ar wid ipeezziben
A d innunnet ujajie ar im$eooqen
Ad asen inin: "anda ten wid tellam taabdem
war Oebbi? Day a kwen ssellken, ne$ ad ssellken iman nnsen
Ad pwagren degs, nitni, akked wid i$elien
akked laaskeo n Iblis, akken ma llan
Ad inin; u nitni, degs, ppemqellaan
s Oebbi, ar nella di ttelfan n uuee
mi kwen nessaadel ar Mass imavalen
D ibe$wviyen kan i a$ itelfen
Ur nesai imcafaen
ne$ aebib i $ ieemmlen
Lemmer ad as nales, a nili d lmumnin
Deg wayagi, s tidep, assekni. Tegwti, degsen, ur uminen
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Nue iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Nue: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Nnan: "day a k namen, mi ddan yidek imezwura n laaouo
Inna: "ur eoi$ ayen xeddmen
Aqeiii nnsen $eo Mass iw kan, lemmer tessinem
Ur swexxioe$, nek, lmumnin
Nek d aneddao kan ipbeginnen
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Nue, war ccekk, a ppepwaoeomev
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, inkeo iyi ugdud iw
Seyyi ferru gari yidsen. Sellek a$, nek, akked lmumnin i illan yidi
Nsellek it, neppa, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo iccuoen
Sinna, deffir waya, Ne$ves wid igwran
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Aad skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen Hud: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a tbennum, di yal ti$ilt, assekni i tfukal nnwen
La tepparam lebouj, amar haat a pwekkoem
Ma tewwtem, tekkatem s leqsee
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Eezzbet i Win i wen Ifkan ayen teeoam
Ifka yawen lmal, tarwa
tibeirin, tiliwa
Nek, ugade$ aaaqeb fellawen, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan: "iaadel $uone$ tnubav, ne$ ur tnubav
Ih, ayagi, siwa d asnulfu imezwura
Ur nelli d wid ara ippuaaqben
Nekoen t. Nesqucc iten. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Tamud skaddben imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuUalie: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Day a kwen ooen, deg wayen illan dagi, testumnem
Di tebeirin akked tliwa
deg igran, tizdayin s ppemoa leqqaqen
La tneooem, d ccaioin, ixxamen deg idurar
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur ssemeaset i lameo iballa$en
i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc d amdan kan, am nekwni. Awi d assekni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "tal$wemt agi, a ppessew deg wass is, kunwi a ppesswem deg wass nnwen
£uowat a p tevvuoem, mulac a kwen iwwet uaaqeb, deg wass abarar
Gezmen as tigwecrar, gwran d di nndama
Iwwet iten uaaqeb. Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n Lui iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna gmat sen UuLui: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Teppeddum ar ddkeo deg imavalen
Teooam tilawin i wen d Ixleq Mass nnwen? Ihi, kunwi d agdud izegren tilas
Nnan: "ma ur tfukkev, a Lui, a k nenfu
Inna: "nek, seg wid ikeohen igiten nnwen
A Mass iw, sellek iyi, nek akked twacult iw, seg igiten nnsen
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, meooa
siwa tam$aot, ar wid igwran
Sinna, Nessenger wiyav
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedoen
Deg wayagi d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, Neppa, d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Agdud n At Teegi iskaddeb imazanen
Mi sen inna Cuaayeb: "day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat, ilmend n waya. Ih, taqdiat iw, apan kan, ar Mass imavalen
Ktilet s lewqama; ur ppilit seg wid issenqasen
Weznet s lmizan uwqim
Ur ccmatet i medden, ayla nnsen; ur ssexsaoet di tmurt s usefsed
Eezzbet i Win ikwen Ixelqen, kunwi akked isuta imenza
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc, d amdan kan, am nekwni. Neesb ik seg wid iskiddiben
Sse$li d fellane$ igezman igenni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "Mass iw Ieoa, sennig wiyav, ayen txeddmem
Skaddben t. Iwwet iten uaaqeb, deg wass n tillas. D aaaqeb, s tidep, n wass abarar
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ar Neppa d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Ar wagi, war ccekk, d ayen id Issers Mass imavalen
Irs ed, yides, ooue n laman
ef wul ik, iwakken a ppiliv seg wid inedoen
s umeslay aaoab ipbegginen
Neppa, s tidep, deg Ihellilen imezwura
Day ur illi ara d assekni i nitni, mi t ssnen imusnawen n At Isoail
Lemmer it id Nessers, i yiwen seg ibeooaniyen
u i$oa yasen t, ur ppamnen yis
Akka, Nessawev it ar wulawen ibe$wviyen
Ur ppamnen yis, alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
A ten id ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Ad inin: "amendeo ma neggani
Day earen s aaaqeb nne£
Day ur twalav ara, N$at iten, d iseggwasen
Sinna, iusa ten id wayen i sen ippuwaaaden
Ula i sen d ibbwi wayen is stumnen
Ur Nesqucc tamdint, siwa tin isaan ineddaoen
i usmekti. Ur Nelli d imednas
Ur d risen yides ccwaien
Ur asen issefk, ur zmiren
Nitni, s tidep, pwaaezlen $ef tmesliwt
Ur naao, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven. Mulac a ppiliv seg wid ara ippuaaqben
Nabi llezm ik i k iqeoben mavi
Ezger tacvai ik $ef wi i k ivefoen si lmumnin
Ma auuan k, ini: "ur ppka$ deg wayen txeddmem
Ppkel $ef Uzmir Ipeunun
I k Ipwalin mara tbeddev
mara d tezziv ar wid iknan
Neppa, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ad awen mle$ anwi i$ef d prusun ccwaien
Prusun ed $ef yal akeddab idensen
Ppaken tameeeu$t. Tegwti degsen d ikeddaben
Imedyazen, iiafaoen ten im$eooqen
Day ur twalav ara, ar nitni, di yal ta$zut pmeniaoen
U nitni qqaoen ayen ur xeddmen
Kkes ed wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, id ismektayen aias Oebbi, i irebeen mbaad ma pwadensen. Ad eoen, wid idensen, tama anida ara ppin
